name: Tully Tots

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Lightly battered and served with our own marinara sauce.

name: Louisiana Crab Dip
description: A blend of real and imitation crab meat, homemade and creamy with a little zing! Served with tortilla chips.

name: Tully's Habañero Wings

name: Garlic Parm Wings
description: Lightly dusted with four then tossed in our homemade garlic Parmesan sauce. Celery and Tully's Ranch dressing included.

name: Salt & Pepper Wings
description: Tossed in our salt and pepper seasoning. Celery and Bleu Cheese included.

name: Tully's Original Wings

name: Tully's Buffalo Wings
description: Tossed in homemade Buffalo sauce. Celery and Bleu cheese included.

name: Loaded Fries

name: Beef Birria Quesadilla

Shredded beef marinated in chipotle adobo with cheddar-jack cheese, tomatoes, jalapeños, black olives, scallions, cilantro and black beans in a flour tortilla. Served with sour cream, shredded lettuce and pico de gallo. Add guacamole $2.39
**Not Available at our Fairmount Location**

name: Veggie Quesadilla

A flour tortilla packed with cheese, tomatoes, jalapeños, black olives and scallions. Served with sour cream and pico de gallo.

name: The Tully

Tenders® served together with Tully’s Honey Mustard. Served with country mashed potatoes and coleslaw.
